GOD.description: If an entity is really powerful.

Infantry.description: If a unit is an infantry. Also counts the amount of space needed.

Artillery.description: If a unit is an artillery. Also counts the amount of space needed.

Armor.description: If a unit is armored. Also counts the amount of space needed.

EliteArmor.description: Used by the elite tank to reduce damage by 1.

WeakArmor.description: Can be used to increase incoming damage by 1.

Coward.description: If a unit can walk on enemy tiles.

Stealth.description: If a unit can move on enemy tiles.

Cloak.description: If a unit can walk through enemy units.

Avian.description: If a unit is flying. When flying, other units can go below it. state = { 0: grounded, 1: flying }

Elite.description: If an entity has the elite status.

Reviveable.description: If an entity can be revived.

Bulldoze.description: Used by enemy bulldozers to ignore the revive of the specified entityTypes.

AoE.description: Not implemented. Allows the entity do do an area of effect attack.
